      Kalugi and Kaluz province Health News

      Kaluzan health is protected at the highest level, subject to all regulations, directives and sanitary standards. That's why people recover like flies. Efficient drugs, modern equipment, skilled professionals and complete modernization were blamed. In addition, in Kaluga, doctors receive incredibly high salaries, there are never epidemics in the city, and endless turns in the register are defeated. You don't believe me? We're honest, too, but the news is,Health" Convince us that Kaluga has a healthy and hopeless future.

info.title: In Kaluz province, the primary health-care upgrade programme will be extended
A new headmaker from Udmurthia was appointed in the Kalusian home.
Putin offered to increase the payment of the Zem Doctor program to 2 million roubles.
In Kaluga, medics will conduct free first-aid training
Kalujanes may undergo free examination from the oncologist on 16 December
Owing to the increase in RWI morbidity in Kaluga and the provinces, they continue to transfer schoolchildren to the remote.
The vaccine against measles, reds and parotitis should arrive in the Kalius region before the end of the year
In Kaluga, the clinic is closed for six months for repair.
In Kaluz province, 526 people were confirmed by the coronavirus in a week.
In 20 schools, children were transferred to distance education
More than 1,500 toys have been collected for the patients of the Kaluz children ' s hospitals
Epidemiology of HIV infection in the world and Russia
